epk_text_fields.value: A brief description of the person or artist's background and accomplishments.
A high-quality and professional photo of the person or artist to be used as a visual representation.
A breakdown of the various membership or sponsorship levels available on Patreon and the corresponding perks and rewards.
Links to the person or artist's official social media profiles, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.
A short video introducing the person or artist and their Patreon platform, explaining the purpose and benefits of supporting them.
A selection of the person or artist's best and most popular content, such as music, artwork, or videos.
Positive reviews or testimonials from satisfied fans or patrons.
Links or excerpts from any articles or media coverage featuring the person or artist and their work.
A list of any notable collaborations or partnerships the person or artist has had with other creators or companies.
A way for potential collaborators or media outlets to contact the person or artist for inquiries or opportunities.
A list or summary of any significant achievements or milestones the person or artist has reached in their career.
A personal message from the person or artist to their fans and supporters, expressing gratitude and outlining their goals for the future.
A schedule of any upcoming events or appearances by the person or artist, such as concerts, shows, or exhibitions.
An outline of any specific items or resources the person or artist may need support with, such as equipment or funding for a project.
